headline: Assurant Recognized on Forbes World’s Best Employers 2025
summary: ATLANTA, October 08, 2025--Assurant, Inc. (NYSE: AIZ), a premier global protection company that safeguards and services connected devices, homes and automobiles in partnership with the world’s leading brands, today announced it has been named to Forbes list of the World’s Best Employers 2025. This marks Assurant’s first appearance on the distinguished ranking, underscoring the company’s commitment to creating an exceptional employee experience, fostering career development, and building an inclu

headline: 5 Stocks With Solid Sales Growth As Markets Touch Record Highs
summary: As markets hit record highs, stocks like StoneCo, Garmin, Assurant, VICI Properties and Duke Energy stand out for strong sales growth.

headline: Assessing Assurant (AIZ) Valuation After Recent Share Price Gains
summary: Assurant (AIZ) has quietly delivered a solid run, with its stock rising around 24% over the past month and posting gains of 14% for the past 3 months. Investors are taking note of its steady momentum. See our latest analysis for Assurant. Looking at the bigger picture, Assurant’s latest stretch of gains adds to a pattern of consistent progress, with a one-year total shareholder return of nearly 16% and a 52% return over three years. Momentum remains firmly on the upswing, suggesting investors...
